'''2.2.2311''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.2310''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.2313''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on March 10, 2021.

== Additions ==
* Added the option to disable hardware acceleration for the Launcher. This should fix some issues related to hybrid graphics and offloading.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue where the installation button for dungeons could become unresponsive.
* {{Bug|MCL-17220}} - Launcher hard crashes when using a custom Java installation with modded instances.
* {{Bug|MCL-17125}} - Launcher window blank/black when using dedicated GPU.
* {{Bug|MCL-17155}} - Launcher doesn't respect HOME variable.
